website_summaries.verdict: A great cage and accessory kit for first-time fishermen who need all of the equipment and accessories.
pros: Kit comes with two vinyl-coated crab traps that can be stacked for storage
Accessories include sinking line, bait bag, and buoy for each pot
cons: Protective paint coating can start to wear off after a few uses, leading to rust

customer_reviews.title: Sure, this'll work..
customer_reviews.text: Please make sure you read the directions, as I did not and thought I was shipped a piece of junk. With a little bit of wrenching, these turn into some pretty sturdy pots. Going to be replacing the twine portion with zipties, and weighting the pots with a rock/bric. Also be sure to rearrange the rubber bands, and when you go out, bring a bunch more with you. Good for the claws and will help you keep those doors only working one way. Would reccomend over promar, not sure about danielson.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Walker

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but get different rope
customer_reviews.text: Pots are quality and require some bending of hooks in order to put together. Use a large pair of pliers with a pad. The twine on the pots is required so that the crabs can escape if the pots get lost. The twine will disintegrate over time. Be sure to remove the rubber bands on the gates. Those are only for shipping. The rope this comes with is thin and cheap. I would buy the other pack that comes with leaded core rope or buy it separately. I would also weigh the pots down with a brick and put some washers or small weights on the gates so they don’t stay open.
customer_reviews.author: Petri

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described!
customer_reviews.text: Caught crabs! Bait bag gets caught in doors, but still works after getting untangled.
customer_reviews.author: AVLent

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more as the season has opened!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my family member who crabs for fun in Northern California off of his boat. I just visited and we crabbed a couple days and these were the lucky pods!! He thinks these are the best he's used...so from a crabber...that's his review!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery VanCamp

customer_reviews.title: Occasional use only, will not last
customer_reviews.text: Super thin metal, edges bent from use. Extremely light traps if you use in the current you’ll have to weight them down. Bought 4, gave them to a family on the beach, 2 were still good and 2 were bent/broken. Used for 4 trips. Most traps last me years.
customer_reviews.author: Palmer

customer_reviews.title: I got crabs . . .
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. I do recommend using zip ties to actually construct the pots, it works better than crimping the metal per the instructions and it makes it easier to take the pots apart for storage in the off-season.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho?Youdaho!

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money! Cages are a bit smaller gauge wire and pretty light, you'll definitely want to put some weight on them if dealing with swift tide flows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Poor construction. Not sinking line.
customer_reviews.text: These are very cheaply made pots. I was very disappointed to find out that is is not sinking line as advertised. You will have to replace it or weight it.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Goss

customer_reviews.title: flimsy and not worth it
customer_reviews.text: flimsy and not worth it. Ring trap works better for off the dock crabbing.
customer_reviews.author: Little Kaijus' Dad

customer_reviews.title: Broke apart as you pulling in the crabs.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 uses, it broke apart. The crab pot broke apart as I was pulling it up today. No crabs. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Cobovn

customer_reviews.title: Not legal in Alaska
customer_reviews.text: There is no trapdoor on the top to get the crabs out easily and the opening with biodegradable string is to small for Alaska
customer_reviews.author: patrick taylor

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was crap! Pot was bent, open package
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was crap! Pot was bent and all packages had been opened and tossed back in bax and retaped!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Bummer dude
customer_reviews.text: This trap is not legal in CA despite info to the contrary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not suitable for Florida Blue Crabs. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not suitable for Florida Blue Crabs. I made the mistake. If you are in California and catching bigger species than this might work. The grids are too big for blues.
customer_reviews.author: storyDVM

customer_reviews.title: looked very good out of the package
customer_reviews.text: looked very good out of the package. use for a 4 day trip and they already so rust where the coating was not thick or chipped off. will hold lots or crab.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: the crab gauge is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: The crab gauge notch that was supposed to be 5 3/4 inches is actually 5 13/16, off by 1/16 inch or 1.6mm.
customer_reviews.author: AWAKE

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time crabber
customer_reviews.text: First time to use the cage for crabbing. It is well designed and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: jason

product_meta.title: KUFA Vinyl Coated Crab Trap Accessory Kit (100' Non-Lead Sinking Line, Clipper, Bait Bag 14" Float) (2 Pack)
product_meta.description: KUFA sports crab traps and accessories offer sport fishermen a wide variety of proven styles and sizes of live traps for crabbing. Our traps/pots and all kind of accessories are fishing the Pacific ocean in California, Oregon, Washington, British Columbia and Alaska. Please chose the right trap and accessories according to your local fishery regulation.
feature_bullets: 1/4 Inch X100' Non-Lead Sinking Line; Crab Clipper (Good For Wa,Or & Al); Durable 4 Arm Harness
Bait Bag With Rubber Locker Easy To Open And Classes; 6"X14" Red/White Float
